entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character, mentioned as 'he' throughout the passage.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards and witches, mentioned as 'the brother and sister Death Eaters'.

entities.name: room of requirement
entities.description: A magical room in the castle, mentioned as being blocked.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A character, mentioned as 'Snape' and associated with Malfoy.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A character, mentioned as 'Malfoy' and associated with Snape.

relationships.description: Harry Potter is targeted by the Death Eaters, as they are running down the staircase and he aims jinxes at them.
Harry Potter is concerned with the Room of Requirement, as it may be blocked and he hopes to find a shortcut.
Harry Potter is pursuing Snape, as he hopes to close in on him and Malfoy.
Harry Potter is pursuing Malfoy, as he hopes to close in on him and Snape.
